ability.Explosive Scales: Pokemon attacking this Pokemon will attach an explosive scale, exploding at the end of the turn. Each scale deals damage equal to 1/10 of maximum HP.
ability.Superheated State: When HP is below 50%, each scale explodes twice, dealing damage equal to 1/5 of maximum HP.

Scale Burst.effect: Drops explosive scales to the opponents.

Inferno Blast.effect: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.

Draco Meteor.effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

Dragon Roar.effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.

Earth Power.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
